title: This was a pretty good movie although it was not scary
review: The Blair Witch Project was an excellent movie considering the circumstances (low budget).  What worked best was the idea of not having a script- it encouraged originality from the actors and made their emotions appear realistic. The movie was not as scary as I had expected but the feeling was eerie.  This is a must see movie because the plot is interesting but if you want to be scared out of your wits, this is not the movie for you.

title: My favorite movie ever- by far the best
review: This movie ruled.  That is all I have to say.  Oh yeah- watch it, buy it, support it.  A classic movie.  Not one to be missed. 10Should have been given movie of the century consideration.
